Headline: Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at 79th. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at 79th.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Shuttle buses will continue to provide connecting service between 95th/Dan Ryan and Garfield in both directions until 9:00 a.m.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Northbound  #71 71st South Shore Temporary Reroute near 71st/Dante
ShortDescription: Northbound #71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via 71st, Stony Island, 67th, Cottage Grove, and 71st, due to a street blockage near 71st/Dante.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via 71st, Stony Island, 67th, Cottage Grove, 71st and resume normal route, due to a street blockage near 71st/Dante.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
